name: Detective Mikanae (DEMO / Beta Ver.)
description:
Mikanae, a young detective, must travel across Artem Island to fight against Vira's creations and protect the citizens of the island. In this top-down adventure, you will use your trusty blaster to fight against robotic enemies.  Can you make it through to the end?

CONTROLS:

"Arrow Keys" for movement and "Space" to shoot.
